title: A TEASE
description: “I love to lick the tip!” she said teasingly. Cheryl meant it as a punishment for the lecherous young man. Something to haunt his dirty mind after she departed the gas station. She didn’t mean for what happened next.After a disastrous night out, Cheryl only wanted to buy a pack of cigarettes and head home. However, her trip to the gas station took an exciting new turn.
author: Stefan A.
